page.title: 17Shopping in New Mills
page.content: There are two markets in New Mills. One on Torr Top Street which is an open market it opens on Friday and Saturday.It sells things like fish and sometimes toys and games.People go there because its very cheap.The other is an indoor market which is also very cheap.That sells more or less the same things.Most trade is done by normal shops. We have a CO-OP by the outdoor market. There is a big car park down the road from the CO-OP.It is a Pay and Display car park. Our main street is Market Street it has about thirty shops on it.Union Road comes a close second with about twenty-five shops on it.Albion Road has the only Swizzel Matlows in the world producing 1000's of sweets in a week.It produces sweets like Refreshers and Love Hearts.
